text: (Nay co mot so nguoi) noi: “Đam thanh nien đo gom ba nguoi, con cho cua chung nua la bon; (so nguoi khac) noi: “Chung gom nam nguoi, con cho cua chung nua la sau, (toan la loi) đoan mo đieu vo hinh. Va (mot so nguoi khac nua lai) noi: “Chung gom bay nguoi, con cho nua la tam.” Hay bao ho (hoi Muhammad!): “Thuong Đe cua Ta biet ro nhat so nguoi cua chung. Chi mot so it biet chuyen đo. Boi the cho tranh luan voi ai ve viec cua chung tru phi biet ro van đe va cung cho hoi bat cu ai ve van đe cua chung.”
